item.title: Stamp an iSAMS report with the current username
item.description: During the summer of 2014, we migrated the St Maryâ€™s Shaftesbury MIS (Management Information System) from Schoolbase to iSAMS. Please note, that the reasons for instigating this major system change, and the processes involved (political & technical), are not covered in this blog post.
